channel.title: InvisionX - One Step Ahead of the Rest
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4174841/chfpGyd.png[/img][/CENTER]
• Fullscreen/resizeable Login Screen • 525 Data • Smooth Loading Bar • 100% Clan Chat system • Custom Tutorial Island • 100% Prestige System • 2 Quests (More will be added in the future) • New Teleport System • 100% Achievement System • Custom Loan System • 100% Duo Slayer • 10+ Bosses • Over 20+ working Skills • Tons of dupe fixed • Amazing Combat • Quickprayers • Unique Content
[SPOILER=Open][ADMIN=Updates][CENTER] Started: Tuesday Apirl 8 [Source/Client Updates] [4/15/14] Fixed 45 errors in the server Cleaned out files Started on FullScreen - Changed home to falador - Fixed a few dupes - Dupes in DA(duel areana) - Dupes in Trade - Dupes in shop - Dupes in Trade (2) - Fixed NPC Drops - Fixed Achievements - Fixed Achievement - Fixed Deposit Worn Items - Fixed withdraw noted items in bank - Special bar lag fixed - Emotes were fixed - Eating rocktail fixed - Ban,ipban,mute,ipmute,unmute,unban,unipmute,and unipbank fixed - Made server more stable - Added in cursors 100% - Smooth login interface [4/16/14] - Started on a new login - Comepeleted New login - Moved loading bar to the middle - Switched logins - New grahpic HD + switched able HD and non-HD - New gameframe changes 562+ or 600+ - Finished fullscreen, better compability - Added setting to the client - Fullscreen options - Changing appearance - Switching between old style hp bar + new one - 100% show item kept on death + correct interface - New hitmarker sprites - Added new achievement goals - Started on ClanChat - 100% money pouch added - Started on Nex -100% prayer [Skill-Prayer Log] + Bone burying: Bones, Big bones, Dragon bones, Frost dragon bones + Working Guilded Alter with double XP if bones are used on it. + Use 'x' option on Altar. + Offer 1,5,10,20,or All + Reasonable drain rates. + Ancient Curses with working protect item, leeches, soul split, and turmoil. + SoulSplit supports specials. + Working Bonecrusher. + Quick Prayers: Normal and Curses - Started on underground dungeons - Custom Report System with admin and mod options - 100% target system - Added new water sprites [4/17/14] - 100% bank tabs - Started on search bar for the bank - Started on bankpin - Added 100% bank all, bank equipment, and bank fimilar items - 100% withdraw noted - Added skilling interface for all 25 skills with their unique aera - Added 100% runecrafting [Skill-Runecrafting Log] + Working Multiple crafting + All altars working + Use of the Abyss + Use of Pouches + Interface -Finished adding call-for-help interface -Added a fully working miasmic barriage(GFX + Anim) [4/18/14] - Started on unique prestige system - Finished adding in the correct interfaces for the prestige - Finished Client-sided part of the prestige system - Started on Server-sided part of the prestige system - Started writing on the Prestige, Prestige Interface, and Prestige Chest - Finished writing the classes - Rewrote the Prestige Interface class so its more neat - Added in Skillguide/menu + interfaces - Prestige tokens added - Prestige Points added - Cleaned out prestige classes [4/19/14] - Finished bankpin 100% functioning - Added in a tab for summoning - Added in 100% bank pin :D [4/22/14] - Started on SOF - Added in sidetab for SOF - Added the correct interfaces - Fixed sidebar interface for SOF - Added in the random chances for SOF - Finished the buy spin - Finished with SOF [4/23/14] - Started on a new Barrows - Added in the correct classes for the barrow - Rewritten the barrow class - Added in client side for the barrow interface - Edited the server side files to work with barrow - Added in second challenge for barrows - Finished barrows 100% - Started on Assault - Finished Assault - Fixed dismantle dupe [4/24/14] - Added in a new player stats interface - Made a new tab - Rewrote a some classes - Cleaned out server files - Added in a new drawinterface - Fixed a glitch with SOF - Added in new panels - Rewrote drawinter class - Finished prestige 100% [4/25/14] - Fixed a lagg problem on server - Reduced 50% lagg from server - Started cleaning out some server files - Finsihed cleaning out server files - Started on some skills - Rewrote some skills - Started on summoning - Added two new classes to summoning - Added client side of summoning - Start on summoning tab - Added in a summon orb - Made 2 npc for summoning - Summoning pouch + creation working - Summoning pet is working - Found a decent location for summoning - Added a summoning shop with some items for pouch creation [Skill Summoning = 80% complete] [4/26/14] - Made a new interface tab for teleportation - Wrote a new teleportation system - Added in the new interface through client-side - Started on server-side for the teleportation system - Completely rewrote the teleporting from mage book - Added in 4 new options to drawinter class - Fully working teleportation through the new tab - Added in a new skill interface to the server - Easier teleportation more smooth [4/27/14] -Started on castle war - Rewrote castle war classes - Added in 2 new castle war java classes - Fixed serversided errors - Added in imports - Fixed some bugs in castle war - Added non team player killing to server - Fixed the clickobject on castlewar - Fixed lobby of castle war - Added in the castlewar java - Rewrote the castlewar java - Added in the cape and remove cape - Added in the hood and remove hood before entering - Some more bugs needs to be fixed [Castle war: 35% complete] [4/28/14] - Rewrote prestige classes - Added prestige chest options to the prestige tab - Made a new prestige tab - Changed background info tab on the player panel - Finished adding in the dialogue for prestige - Added in the prestige ability interface to the panel - Completely rewrote the prestigechest java - Fixed all the bugs when using the prestige chest - Fixed a bug in the prestige interface - Added in a paneldelay when switching panels - Finished with prestige [Prestige = 100%] [4/29/14] - Started working on the tutorial island - Editted some class for tutorial island - Added in some npc for tutorial island - Rewrote some dialogue - Fixed actionhandler - Rewritten the woodcutting class - Added in a bank to the tutorial island - Fixed tutorial island saved progress - Fixed some errors on server - Fixed all warning in the server [Tutorial island = 100%] [4/30/14] -Started on donator panel - Brainstormed some ideas for donator only - Starting to work on a zombie only minigame for donators - Added in a donator panel - Started to work on the donator panel - Edited a few bug on the donator panel - Finished the donator panel - Still need to adding in the clickingbutton [5/1/14] - Added in zombie classes for donatoronly - Added zombie getting harder each wave - Added zombie reward - Still need to work on zombie point shop [Zombie for doantor only = 95% compelete] - Started working on event npc - Added in a new event point system - Special event items related to some other games added - Working on event shop + point handler - Trying to find a good place for the event - Planning on changing the home area - Fixed the background fading glitch on the client [5/31/14] - Fixed glitch in pking at edgeville [6/1/14] - Removed zombie minigame - Wrote a 2014 Halloween event [early] - Added a decent clue scroll system - Fixed a glitch in duel areana - Fixed a small bank pin glitch - Cleaned out the player class file - Rewrote the pest control java [Cleaner] - Started on a new boss [The Inadequacy], and [Mutant Tarn] - Removed Nomad[Added it in for a quest] [6/17/14] - Started on server event - Added in special reward for each event - Finished adding in money pouch - Curses/quick prayers has been added - Added in a new target system for pking - Bounty-like targeting system - Rewrote the drop for the server - Fixed some skill emote on server [6/18/14] - Started on a dwarf multi-cannon - Finished making the dwarf multi-cannon - Started working on a new login screen - Added in Antique Lamps - Added in server-side for the lamps - Finished with the Antique Lamps - Added in PrestigeCapes - Prestige System 95% Complete - Fixed a small bug when prestiging - Added in a couple of quests - The Ritual Quest Added - Started on The job quest - Finished adding the jobb quest - Rewrote the ritual quest - Fixed some glitches when switching panels - Fixed dcing when entering caves - Started working on the beta release - Started working on auto cachedownloader - Fixing some glitch and bugs on auto downloader - Finally finish with cache downloader [6/19/14] - Started a new minigame called "The Conquer" - Added in some custom interface for the starting screen of the minigame - Started working on server-sided issue of the minigame [7/18/14] - Fixed a emptying bug - Still working on "The Conquer" - Added in display names - Rewrote the entire prestige class - Rewrote prestigeinterface - Fixed email already set - Fixed messed up emotes - Added fight pits - Added castle wars - Added clan chat tutorial + did more (It had like 100 + errors, so I had to convert and change up a lot of code) - Fixed character updating, etc - Conquer Minigame Fixed: - Bringing & wearing items in there - You now spawn in the middle in the middle of the minigame - Fixed teleporting from the conquer minigame - When you logout out you spawn back in home and you lose all items - When you die you lose all items correctly to prevent dupes - Cleaned out playersave & client & playerassistant [7/19/14] - Fixed viewing orb bug in fight pits - Fixed logging out problem in "The Conquer" - Fixed fightpits "Stop viewing" Option - Fixed tutorial island bug at the end [7/20/14] - Added in a new system Loan Features - Loaning money (max 50m) - Loan due date (+5 days) - 5% rate to orginal loan - Each loan could only be done under 1 IP - Shops are disable after loan is overdue - Loan npc id: 9394 - Client new updater. Special thx for Mr. Fox! - New client login [7/21/14] - Fixed a summoning dupe glitch in server - Fixed run orb bug - Change loading screen background - Added a more smoother loading screen - New background for client - Clan chat system added in server Features: - Ranking - Setup - Banning - Total owner control - Basic clan chat - Auto join - Fixed auto join in server - Added new text engine - Converted one of the quest into the new text engine [7/22/14] - Fixed up achievements - Took out The Conquer interface due to unexplain bugs - Renamed "The Conquer" into AOT or Attack of Titans <-(Lol) - Restarted on AOT - Fixed up some shop bug - Rewrote the prestige dialogues - Fixed prestige abilities - Added another new login screen - Added summoning Features: - Summontab working with buttons - Infusing pouch interface - Npc vs Npc - Monster dropping random charms - Talking Dialogue heads [7/23/14] - Added in a new yell system - New login screen finished - Added ItemOnPlayer - Added in working christmas crackers - Added in a custom duo slayer system Features: - Gem which shows you your task, using gem on player to send request for a task - Added shop for DuoPoints - Task cancel = 10 points - Randomly generate tasks - Slayer reqs - Sharing the exp - New loading screen (bottom of the loading screen) - Added in server announcing each 99 reach [7/24/14] - Fixed teleporting out of castle wars - Fixed shop for Attack Of Titans - Added new loading screen - Added in nex armour effects - Added in spirit shield effects [7/25/14] - Fixed unable to attack npc bug - Removed a couple of shops - Fixed a bug in trading - Fixed up smithing interface bug - Fixed server @red@ and gre colors - Changed slayerreq - Changed achievement tab into staffhelp tab - Changed emotes - Fixed fightpit bug [/CENTER]
[center][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dd9xtvjw0gQ&list=UUrOhzm6gW_nLFnKjulbYPww&index=3[/youtube][/center]

item.title: InvisionX - One Step Ahead of the Rest
item.dc:creator: @Invision-X Invision-X
item.description:
@Invision-X wrote:

I actually stopped working on Invision and started up a new project call Astray, and i’m looking for server-developers and client-developers.

Read full topic
item.source: InvisionX - One Step Ahead of the Rest

item.title: InvisionX - One Step Ahead of the Rest

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yeah, this does look quite nice - I wish for the best and hope to see more. Do you ever plan on hosting this (apologies if it’s in the OP, too much to read - only saw pictures)?

Read full topic

[CENTER][/CENTER]

• Fullscreen/resizeable Login Screen
• 525 Data
• Smooth Loading Bar
• 100% Clan Chat system
• Custom Tutorial Island
• 100% Prestige System
• 2 Quests (More will be added in the future)
• New Teleport System
• 100% Achievement System
• Custom Loan System
• 100% Duo Slayer
• 10+ Bosses
• Over 20+ working Skills
• Tons of dupe fixed
• Amazing Combat
• Quickprayers
• Unique Content

[SPOILER=Open][ADMIN=Updates][CENTER]
Started:
Tuesday Apirl 8
[Source/Client Updates]
[4/15/14]
Fixed 45 errors in the server
Cleaned out files

  • Changed home to falador
  • Fixed a few dupes

  • Rewrote the pest control java [Cleaner]
  • Started on a new boss [The Inadequacy], and [Mutant Tarn]

  • Started on server event

  • Curses/quick prayers has been added

  • Bounty-like targeting system
  • Rewrote the drop for the server

    [6/18/14]
  • Started on a dwarf multi-cannon
  • Finished making the dwarf multi-cannon
  • Started working on a new login screen

  • Added in server-side for the lamps
  • Finished with the Antique Lamps

    [6/19/14]
  • Started a new minigame called “The Conquer”

    [7/18/14]
  • Fixed a emptying bug

  • Fixed email already set
  • Fixed messed up emotes
  • Added fight pits
  • Added castle wars
  • Added clan chat tutorial + did more (It had like 100 + errors, so I had to convert and change up a lot of code)
  • Fixed character updating, etc
  • Conquer Minigame
    Fixed:
  • Bringing & wearing items in there
  • You now spawn in the middle in the middle of the minigame
  • Fixed teleporting from the conquer minigame
  • When you logout out you spawn back in home and you lose all items
  • When you die you lose all items correctly to prevent dupes
  • Cleaned out playersave & client & playerassistant
    [7/19/14]

    [7/20/14]
  • Added in a new system Loan
    Features
  • Loaning money (max 50m)
  • Loan due date (+5 days)
  • 5% rate to orginal loan
  • Each loan could only be done under 1 IP
  • Shops are disable after loan is overdue
  • Loan npc id: 9394
  • Client new updater. Special thx for Mr. Fox!
  • New client login
    [7/21/14]
  • Fixed a summoning dupe glitch in server

  • Change loading screen background

    Features:
  • Ranking

  • Auto join
